metadata.title: CVE-2017-12839 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read in the getbits function insrc/libmpg123/getbits.h in mpg123 through 1.25.5 allows remote attackers tocause a possible denial-of-service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted mp3 file.

criterions.comment: mpg123: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
